cards.career_future_en: Business will grow across borders; success will come from a restless vision.
cards.finance_past_en: Money has been invested to generate future profits.
cards.finance_present_en: Waiting for investment returns; income might come from afar or online sources.
cards.finance_future_en: Cash flow will pour in from market expansion; financial status will solidify.
cards.action_prompt_en: Look beyond your own nose! Expand your territory and prepare to handle the incoming opportunities.
cards.reflection_question_en: Which ship are you waiting for to dock, and have you prepared the warehouse to store the goods?
cards.affirmation_en: My ships are bringing success back to me.
cards.hook_en: A smart kitty doesn't just look at the bowl in front, but dreams of the fish in the ocean!
cards.ritual_2min_en: Stand facing East or an open window. Spread your arms to the wind. Visualize a merchant ship sailing towards you carrying your desires.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What is your next biggest step?
What new territory (skill/place) do you want to plant your flag in?
How patient are you in waiting for results?
cards.keywords_light: expansion, foresight, overseas travel, progress, commerce
cards.keywords_shadow: delays, obstacles to travel, lack of foresight, disappointment, arrogance
cards.image_alt_en: A cat merchant in elegant robes standing on a cliff edge, watching three ships sail across a golden sea at sunset, leaning on a wand.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A ginger cat merchant wearing elegant green and red robes standing on a high cliff edge with back to viewer, leaning on one of three planted wooden wands, watching golden ships sail on a shimmering sea at sunset, art nouveau style, hopeful atmosphere.
cards.meta_description_en: Three of Wands Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Explore expansion, foresight, and overseas opportunities. See what rewards are coming your way.

cards.tarot_imply_en: celebration, stability, homecoming, joy, harmony
cards.standalone_past_en: You recently experienced a joyous event or celebrated an initial milestone. The warmth and happiness from that moment still fuel your positivity.
cards.standalone_present_en: Put down the heavy work and party! An atmosphere of joy and reunion is here, whether it's a wedding, a feast, or simply coming home to loved ones.
cards.standalone_future_en: Stability and happiness lie ahead. You will establish a strong life foundation or attend an auspicious event that swells your heart with joy.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past successes lead to present celebrations, paving the way for lasting stability and happiness in the future.
cards.love_past_en: Love blossomed; you shared beautiful memories or committed to building a family.
cards.love_present_en: Stable and happy love; there might be good news about a wedding or moving in together.
cards.love_future_en: Married life will be smooth, warm, and solid, feeling like a true homecoming.
cards.career_past_en: Projects passed with flying colors; you received overwhelming praise and recognition from the team.
cards.career_present_en: Working happily with a great team atmosphere, or celebrating a recent success.
cards.career_future_en: Career stability is assured with a good foundation, or a promotion to a more comfortable spot.
cards.finance_past_en: Investments started bearing fruit; a lump sum came in for circulation.
cards.finance_present_en: Spending money on happiness, home decoration, or buying real estate for stability.
cards.finance_future_en: Financial status will be secure and safe; you will have tangible assets.
cards.action_prompt_en: Go celebrate small wins right now! Buy flowers for your home or dine with friends.
cards.reflection_question_en: Who is the 'home' that makes you feel safest and happiest?
cards.affirmation_en: I allow myself to be happy and celebrate every success.
cards.hook_en: You've worked hard... time for a celebratory treat, kitty?
cards.ritual_2min_en: Buy fresh bright flowers for 4 corners of your room, or throw a mini-party (even solo) with your favorite dish to attract joyful energy.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What recent success did you forget to celebrate?
What is the vibe of your 'dream home'?
List 3 people you'd most like to invite to a party.
cards.keywords_light: celebration, joy, harmony, homecoming, relaxation
cards.keywords_shadow: lack of support, instability, conflicts at home, canceled event, feeling unwelcome
cards.image_alt_en: Two happy cats dancing under a canopy of four wooden wands adorned with garlands and grapes, with a castle in the background.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: Two joyful ginger cats dancing on hind legs under a floral canopy supported by four wooden wands, garlands of flowers and grapes, golden castle in background, sunny meadow, art nouveau style, warm yellow and orange tones.
cards.meta_description_en: Four of Wands Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Unlock joy, celebration, and homecoming. Discover what this happy card says about your stability.

cards.tarot_imply_en: competition, conflict, chaos, brainstorming, proving oneself
cards.standalone_past_en: You have recently navigated a mini-battlefield, be it arguments or fierce competition. Past chaos taught you exactly how tough you need to be to stand your ground.
cards.standalone_present_en: It's noisy and chaotic! You are in the middle of a conflict or competition where no one wants to back down. It might be annoying, but it's a chance to sharpen your skills.
cards.standalone_future_en: Get ready to enter the arena! Competition is heating up. You will need significant effort to overcome rivals and prove you are the real deal.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past conflicts have left the present situation simmering with competition. But if you don't give up, the future grants a victory that will make you proud of your abilities.
cards.love_past_en: There were bickering, lovers' quarrels, or rivals stepping in between.
cards.love_present_en: Watch out for clashes; egos are high, and listening is low. Someone might be flirting with your partner.
cards.love_future_en: You must overcome obstacles or beat rivals to win their heart. Not easy, but worth it.
cards.career_past_en: You worked in a cutthroat environment or attended meetings that went nowhere.
cards.career_present_en: Fierce brainstorming! Colleagues disagree, or you are competing for sales numbers against others.
cards.career_future_en: Market competition will spike. You must remain active constantly; no standing still.
cards.finance_past_en: You struggled to juggle funds or had disputes over financial interests.
cards.finance_present_en: Money comes hard; you have to fight for it. Beware of conflicts of interest with partners.
cards.finance_future_en: Plan finances tightly to battle business rivals or swarming expenses.
cards.action_prompt_en: Jump into the fray! Don't fear conflict; view it as a sport where you learn to win and lose.
cards.reflection_question_en: Is this conflict generating new ideas, or just generating annoyance?
cards.affirmation_en: I grow and become stronger amidst challenges.
cards.hook_en: Ready to rumble, kitty? No place for the weak in this arena!
cards.ritual_2min_en: Do high-impact exercise like boxing or sprinting to release excess energy and aggression creatively.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
Who is your most formidable rival right now?
How can you turn conflict into drive?
What is something you are willing to fight tooth and nail for?
cards.keywords_light: competition, brainstorming, ambition, challenge, adrenaline
cards.keywords_shadow: aggression, petty arguments, chaos, lack of cooperation, burnout
cards.image_alt_en: Five energetic cats of different breeds playfully fighting with wooden sticks in a grassy field, creating a chaotic but non-violent scene.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: Five energetic cats of different breeds (Siamese, Tabby, Black, White, Calico) playfully wrestling and clashing with five wooden wands in a green meadow, dynamic motion lines, chaotic but playful atmosphere, art nouveau style.
cards.meta_description_en: Five of Wands Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Embrace competition and conflict. Learn how challenges and chaos can sharpen your skills.

cards.tarot_imply_en: victory, recognition, fame, public success, pride
cards.standalone_past_en: You have recently achieved a victory or gained recognition for your hard work. The applause and admiration from the past validate your capabilities.
cards.standalone_present_en: This is your moment of glory! You are riding the white horse to the finish line amidst cheers. Your success is being broadcast to the world; accept the praise with pride.
cards.standalone_future_en: Victory is just around the corner. You will receive a promotion, an award, or higher acclaim. Your efforts will definitely not go to waste.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past successes have built your reputation today, and this momentum will propel you toward greater victory and widespread recognition in the future.
cards.love_past_en: You successfully won someone's heart or overcame love obstacles beautifully.
cards.love_present_en: Enviable love! Your partner admires you, or everyone roots for you. Singles will attract high-profile admirers.
cards.love_future_en: Love will succeed as hoped. You might debut a partner or announce good news publicly.
cards.career_past_en: You received an award, employee of the month, or hit targets so well you're remembered for it.
cards.career_present_en: Your work impresses the boss and peers. Prepare for promotion or public praise.
cards.career_future_en: You will be a star in your field. Advancement and fame will come running to you.
cards.finance_past_en: You received a bonus or returns that made you grin from ear to ear.
cards.finance_present_en: Finances are improving daily. Success brings satisfying income and stability.
cards.finance_future_en: Career success will transform into wealth. Your reputation will help monetize your skills.
cards.action_prompt_en: Don't be overly humble! Show your work to the world and walk with your head held high.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you ready to step up to the podium and be the center of attention?
cards.affirmation_en: I am worthy of every success and compliment I receive.
cards.hook_en: Practice your acceptance speech, kitty, because the spotlight is swinging your way!
cards.ritual_2min_en: Stand in a 'Super Hero' pose in front of a mirror. Smile and thank yourself aloud for 2 minutes to summon confidence.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What is the achievement you are most proud of?
If you were to reward yourself today, what would it be?
How do you feel when praised in public?
cards.keywords_light: victory, success, pride, recognition, confidence
cards.keywords_shadow: arrogance, egoism, fall from grace, needing validation, envy
cards.image_alt_en: A triumphant cat wearing a laurel wreath riding a white horse through a cheering crowd of other cats holding wands up high.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A triumphant ginger cat wearing a green laurel wreath riding a adorned white horse, parading through a crowd of cheering cats holding wooden wands with ribbons, confetti falling, bright blue sky, art nouveau style, celebratory.
cards.meta_description_en: Six of Wands Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Victory, fame, and public recognition. Prepare for success and applause.

cards.tarot_imply_en: new love, overflowing emotion, healing, intuition, emotional opportunity
cards.standalone_past_en: You recently experienced a heart-swelling emotion or spiritual healing. It was the beginning of a relationship or artistic inspiration.
cards.standalone_present_en: Your heart is open and overflowing with good feelings. The cup runneth over; this is a golden time to express love, compassion, and forgiveness.
cards.standalone_future_en: A deep new relationship is about to begin, or you will find spiritual fulfillment that completes your life. It could also indicate pregnancy or a new creative project.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past openness has prepared you to receive love fully now, leading to new relationships or overflowing happiness in the future.
cards.love_past_en: Just developed a crush, or the relationship entered a sweet honeymoon phase.
cards.love_present_en: Falling hard! Extremely sensitive and romantic, ready to pour your heart out.
cards.love_future_en: New love awaits, or the current relationship will deepen into profound understanding.
cards.career_past_en: Started a job you love or found inspiration for artistic creation.
cards.career_present_en: Working with heart over head. The workplace atmosphere is supportive and understanding.
cards.career_future_en: You will get a fulfilling job, or a passion project will succeed beautifully.
cards.finance_past_en: You willingly helped others financially out of kindness.
cards.finance_present_en: Spending on loved ones or charity. Money flows in and out like water.
cards.finance_future_en: Abundance will come with joy, not just numbers in a bank account.
cards.action_prompt_en: Uncork your heart! Let your feelings flow and share your love with those around you.
cards.reflection_question_en: What makes your inner cup overflow with joy?
cards.affirmation_en: I am open to the love and joy flowing into my life.
cards.hook_en: When the water rises, collect it... when love rises, embrace it.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Drink a glass of water slowly. Visualize it as pink love energy flowing into your body, washing away negativity and filling your heart.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
Who do you want to say 'I love you' to right now?
What is a good feeling you received recently?
How will you show kindness to yourself today?
cards.keywords_light: love, compassion, creativity, new feelings, intuition
cards.keywords_shadow: emotional overwhelm, blocked creativity, emptiness, repressed feelings
cards.image_alt_en: A white cat gazing up at a giant golden chalice overflowing with five streams of water into a lotus pond, with a dove flying above.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A mystical white cat gazing up at a giant golden chalice overflowing with five streams of water into a lotus-filled pond, a white dove descending with a wafer, serene blue sky, art nouveau style, magical sparkles.
cards.meta_description_en: Ace of Cups Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Embrace new love, emotional beginnings, and creativity. See what this overflowing card brings.

cards.tarot_imply_en: mutual attraction, partnership, connection, harmony, shared feelings
cards.standalone_past_en: You recently met someone with whom you clicked instantly, or reconciled with a loved one. A moment of true understanding and connection has occurred.
cards.standalone_present_en: The world revolves around the two of you! A deep exchange of feelings and understanding is happening. Whether in love or business partnership, everything is falling into place perfectly.
cards.standalone_future_en: The relationship will deepen significantly. Expect a commitment, becoming a couple, or a business joint venture. This partnership will bring beautiful results.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: The connection formed in the past creates present harmony and understanding, serving as a vital foundation for this relationship to grow steadily in the future.
cards.love_past_en: You shared sweet memories with someone or just started talking and felt a great vibe.
cards.love_present_en: Mutual feelings! If single, you'll meet a soulmate. If taken, love is as sweet as the honeymoon phase.
cards.love_future_en: The relationship will advance; there is a high chance of a serious commitment.
cards.career_past_en: You worked with a partner who understood you well, or had a smooth negotiation.
cards.career_present_en: Excellent cooperation from colleagues or finding a trustworthy business partner.
cards.career_future_en: Signing contracts or agreements will go smoothly; a win-win for both sides.
cards.finance_past_en: You successfully merged finances or shared expenses with someone.
cards.finance_present_en: Finances are balanced. Someone might offer help or give you a gift.
cards.finance_future_en: Joint investments will yield satisfying profits; financial status improves with a partner.
cards.action_prompt_en: Open your heart wide and reach out. Your sincerity will definitely be reciprocated.
cards.reflection_question_en: Who acts as the mirror reflecting your true self most clearly right now?
cards.affirmation_en: I attract relationships filled with love and understanding into my life.
cards.hook_en: One plus one doesn't equal two... it equals infinite love.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Stand before a mirror, gaze into your eyes, and say kind words. Or, if coupled, stare into each other's eyes silently for 2 minutes to connect souls without words.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What are 3 qualities you look for in a 'partner' (work or love)?
What does your ideal relationship look like?
Are you ready to be a giver as much as a receiver?
cards.keywords_light: partnership, unity, soulmates, attraction, harmony
cards.keywords_shadow: imbalance, broken trust, co-dependency, arguments, disconnection
cards.image_alt_en: Two affectionate cats touching noses, their tails forming a heart shape, holding two golden cups with intertwined steam rising up.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: Two affectionate cats (one white, one black) sitting facing each other and touching noses, tails forming a heart shape, holding golden chalices with intertwining pink steam rising above, soft pastel background, romantic art nouveau style.
cards.meta_description_en: Two of Cups Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Discover soulmates, mutual attraction, and perfect partnerships. See what this romantic card reveals.

cards.tarot_imply_en: celebration, friendship, joy, community, reunion
cards.standalone_past_en: You recently enjoyed a joyful time with friends or celebrated a shared success. Those happy memories are still vivid.
cards.standalone_present_en: Party time! It's time to socialize, meet friends, or celebrate small wins. The atmosphere is filled with laughter and warmth.
cards.standalone_future_en: A party, wedding, or grand reunion is on the horizon. You will receive help and encouragement from good friends.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past joys of friendship create a celebratory atmosphere now, leading to warm reunions and social support in the future.
cards.love_past_en: Love started from friendship, or you met someone special on a group date.
cards.love_present_en: Love is fun and companionable. You might introduce your partner to friends or party together.
cards.love_future_en: Marriage is possible, or the relationship will integrate into each other's families and social circles.
cards.career_past_en: You worked in a highly compatible team or celebrated a project closing.
cards.career_present_en: Friendly workplace atmosphere; colleagues are helpful, and you enjoy working together.
cards.career_future_en: Team success awaits; there will be celebrations for sales or collective progress.
cards.finance_past_en: You spent money on partying or treating friends.
cards.finance_present_en: Expenses for entertainment and socializing, but it brings joy and emotional value.
cards.finance_future_en: Prepare budget for social gifts/events, or luck may come from acquaintances.
cards.action_prompt_en: Call your best friend and meet up now! Share good stories and recharge each other.
cards.reflection_question_en: Who is the true friend you can laugh and cry with in any situation?
cards.affirmation_en: I am surrounded by good friendship and sincere love.
cards.hook_en: No cat can live without a clowder... time to go find your friends!
cards.ritual_2min_en: Invite friends over or text them appreciation. Tell them they matter. Expressing gratitude attracts more joy.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What is your funniest memory with friends?
What do you want to throw a party for soon?
What does friendship mean to your life?
cards.keywords_light: celebration, friendship, community, joy, gathering
cards.keywords_shadow: overindulgence, gossip, exclusion, partying too much, shallow relationships
cards.image_alt_en: Three happy cats dancing in a circle with raised cups, surrounded by harvest fruits and flowers, celebrating together.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: Three joyful cats (calico, tabby, white) dancing on hind legs in a circle, raising golden cups in a toast, surrounded by pumpkins, grapes and flowers, harvest festival vibe, art nouveau style, warm colors.
cards.meta_description_en: Three of Cups Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Celebrate friendship, community, and joy. Discover what this social card reveals for you.

cards.tarot_imply_en: boredom, discontent, missed opportunity, contemplation, apathy
cards.standalone_past_en: You recently went through a phase of boredom or disappointment. Even though good things were offered, you chose to overlook or reject them, fixated on what was missing.
cards.standalone_present_en: You are sitting with your arms crossed, seeing the world negatively. Everything feels unsatisfactory, blinding you to the golden opportunity (the fourth cup) right in front of you. Look up!
cards.standalone_future_en: If you stay wallowing in boredom, you might miss a crucial train. But if you open up to new things, even if not 100% perfect, life will take a turn for the better.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past dissatisfaction has led to present withdrawal. However, a new opportunity awaits your grasp. Simply shifting your perspective will instantly brighten your future.
cards.love_past_en: You rejected good suitors while waiting for 'the one', or felt bored in a previous relationship.
cards.love_present_en: Singles are too picky; couples feel the relationship has gone stale and lost its spark.
cards.love_future_en: You might regret it later if you play hard to get or overlook a good love that is close by.
cards.career_past_en: You turned down a job or opportunity thinking it wasn't good enough, or felt burned out.
cards.career_present_en: Totally bored with work! Feeling stuck in a rut, uninspired, wanting to quit but hesitant.
cards.career_future_en: A new opportunity will arrive, possibly in an unexpected form. Don't reject it immediately; consider it first.
cards.finance_past_en: Overlooked small income streams because you were hoping for a get-rich-quick scheme.
cards.finance_present_en: Dissatisfied with current income but not actively striving to earn more.
cards.finance_future_en: You might miss a good investment opportunity due to hesitation or sticking to old ways.
cards.action_prompt_en: Stop staring at empty cups! Look at the full ones and be grateful for what you have right now.
cards.reflection_question_en: What opportunity is floating right in front of you that you are pretending not to see?
cards.affirmation_en: I open my heart to the gifts and opportunities the universe offers.
cards.hook_en: Bored of the same old kibble? Look closely, there might be a mackerel right behind you.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Meditate for 2 minutes. Imagine a hand offering you a large gift box. Accept it and open it (in your mind) to train your spirit to receive opportunities.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What are 3 things you have but forget to appreciate?
Why do you feel bored with the current situation?
If you said 'yes' to an incoming opportunity, how would life change?
cards.keywords_light: contemplation, re-evaluation, meditation, introspection, stability
cards.keywords_shadow: boredom, apathy, missed opportunities, depression, discontent
cards.image_alt_en: A bored cat sitting under a tree with crossed arms (paws), ignoring three cups on the ground and a fourth cup being offered by a cloud hand.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A sulky grey cat sitting under a tree with crossed paws, looking away from three golden cups on the grass, ignoring a fourth cup being offered by a mystical hand from a cloud, serene but stagnant atmosphere, art nouveau style.
cards.meta_description_en: Four of Cups Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Overcome boredom and apathy. Don't miss the new opportunities waiting right in front of you.

cards.tarot_imply_en: disappointment, loss, grief, dwelling on the past, remaining hope
cards.standalone_past_en: You have recently experienced the pain of loss or disappointment. It was a difficult time where you focused so much on what was gone that you missed what remained.
cards.standalone_present_en: You are crying over spilt milk, unaware that there are still two full cups standing right behind you, brimming with hope. Turn around! Life isn't as hopeless as you think.
cards.standalone_future_en: Sadness will gradually fade once you accept reality and start looking at the good things that remain. Healing begins when you stop dwelling on the past.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past disappointments keep you sorrowful in the present. But if you simply turn around, you'll see that hope and opportunity are still waiting for you in the future.
cards.love_past_en: Just broke up or suffered a major heartbreak; still dwelling on the past.
cards.love_present_en: Too busy grieving over someone who doesn't love you to see the good person waiting right behind.
cards.love_future_en: It takes time to heal, but eventually, you will move on and be ready to start again.
cards.career_past_en: A project failed or you didn't get the expected job, leaving you discouraged.
cards.career_present_en: Disappointed with results or colleagues. Don't wallow! Learn from mistakes and push forward.
cards.career_future_en: New opportunities will replace what was lost, but don't let fear of failure stand in your way.
cards.finance_past_en: Suffered a significant financial loss, a costly lesson learned.
cards.finance_present_en: Regretting lost money only brings stress. Focus on managing what you have left instead.
cards.finance_future_en: Things will improve if you stop lamenting and start planning your finances wisely again.
cards.action_prompt_en: Wipe your tears and turn around! Good things are still waiting for you. Don't throw away the remaining chances.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you so focused on regretting what you lost that you forgot to be grateful for what you still have?
cards.affirmation_en: I release my grief and embrace the new hope that awaits.
cards.hook_en: It's okay to cry, kitty... but don't forget there's still half a mackerel left in the bowl!
cards.ritual_2min_en: Write down your regrets and tear the paper up. Then, pick up 2 cherished items, place them in front of you, and thank them for still being there.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What lesson did your last disappointment teach you?
What are 3 good things that still remain in your life right now?
How can you forgive yourself and move on?
cards.keywords_light: resilience, acceptance, forgiveness, moving on, hope
cards.keywords_shadow: grief, loss, regret, pessimism, despair
cards.image_alt_en: A cloaked black cat looking down sadly at three spilled cups of milk, while two full cups stand upright behind it, unnoticed.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A sorrowful black cat wearing a dark cloak looking down at three overturned golden goblets with spilled red wine on the ground, two upright goblets stand behind unnoticed, grey cloudy sky, river in background, art nouveau style.
cards.meta_description_en: Five of Cups Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Overcome grief, loss, and disappointment. Discover the hope and opportunities you might be missing.

cards.tarot_imply_en: nostalgia, old friends, innocence, homecoming, simple joys
cards.standalone_past_en: You recently revisited sweet childhood memories or reunited with old friends and places, warming your heart and bringing a sense of safety.
cards.standalone_present_en: The past is coming back to say hello! An ex-lover or school friend might contact you, or you are simply craving the unconditional joy of childhood.
cards.standalone_future_en: Pure and simple joy awaits. You will return to your roots or revive a long-lost relationship, bringing it back to life.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past memories create a sense of nostalgia now. However, reconnecting with those good things will bring happiness and healing in the future.
cards.love_past_en: You experienced a pure love like a first crush, or a bond that couldn't be severed.
cards.love_present_en: An ex is returning! Or your current relationship feels deeply familiar, like family.
cards.love_future_en: You might find love with someone younger, or an old flame will ask to reconcile.
cards.career_past_en: You worked in a homely environment or collaborated with old friends.
cards.career_present_en: Old jobs might generate income again, or childhood memories could spark new ideas.
cards.career_future_en: You might return to a previous workplace or work in fields related to children and caregiving.
cards.finance_past_en: You received an inheritance or a sentimental gift from an elder.
cards.finance_present_en: You are being supported or receiving help from someone from your past.
cards.finance_future_en: Investing in antiques, collectibles, or traditional real estate will be profitable.
cards.action_prompt_en: Be a kid again! Play, laugh easily, and offer kindness to others without expecting anything in return.
cards.reflection_question_en: What was your favorite childhood toy, and where has it gone?
cards.affirmation_en: I embrace my inner child with love.
cards.hook_en: Grandma's cookies... remember how sweet and comforting they smelled?
cards.ritual_2min_en: Close your eyes and revisit your happiest childhood moment. Absorb that safety and carefree feeling, then carry it with you all day.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
Which old friend do you miss most, and what would you say to them?
What childhood activity do you want to do again?
What is the simplest joy in your life right now?
cards.keywords_light: nostalgia, childhood memories, innocence, reunion, gifts
cards.keywords_shadow: living in the past, naivety, unrealistic nostalgia, stuck in childhood, clinging
cards.image_alt_en: Two kittens, one slightly larger, sharing a flower in a garden full of blooming white cups (flowers), evoking innocence and sharing.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: Two sweet kittens (one grey, one white) in an old walled garden, the larger kitten offering a cup filled with white flowers to the smaller one, soft pastel colors, vintage storybook style, innocent and nostalgic atmosphere.
cards.meta_description_en: Six of Cups Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Explore nostalgia, childhood memories, and returning love. Reconnect with your inner child.

cards.tarot_imply_en: many choices, illusions, imagination, confusion, indecision
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have wasted time chasing intangible dreams or getting lost in fantasies, forgetting to take action in the real world.
cards.standalone_present_en: So many choices are floating before your eyes, it's dizzying! Be careful; some might be gold, but others are just gilded stones. You must discern carefully.
cards.standalone_future_en: If you pick a path and stop daydreaming, success is yours. But if you get greedy and want everything, you might end up with nothing.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past imaginations created today's abundant choices. But you must wake up and pick one to transform illusions into reality in the future.
cards.love_past_en: You had crushes everywhere or fantasized about a fairy tale prince/princess who doesn't exist.
cards.love_present_en: Talking to multiple people or confused between 'Mr. Right' and 'Mr. Right Now'. Beware of a collision.
cards.love_future_en: You must clearly choose someone. Hesitation will cause you to lose all the good ones.
cards.career_past_en: Had a million ideas but finished none due to a lack of focus.
cards.career_present_en: Many job offers or distracted wanting to do everything. Pick one and go for it.
cards.career_future_en: You will discover your true path after much trial and error.
cards.finance_past_en: Wasted money on useless luxury items or investments that looked good only on the surface.
cards.finance_present_en: Beware of scams, dream-selling promotions, or Ponzi schemes offering unrealistic returns.
cards.finance_future_en: Prioritize your spending, or your money will dissolve like sugar in water.
cards.action_prompt_en: Wake up! Stop fantasizing and face reality. Choose the most tangible option and act on it.
cards.reflection_question_en: Is what you are chasing a true desire or just an illusion?
cards.affirmation_en: I see the truth through illusions and choose the best for myself.
cards.hook_en: Mackerel on the plate or goldfish in the bowl? Choose wisely; some aren't edible!
cards.ritual_2min_en: List everything you want to do. Cross out the unrealistic ones one by one until only the most important one remains. Focus on that.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
If you had one wish, what would it be?
Are you deceiving yourself about anything?
Which goal should you 'drop' to lighten your life?
cards.keywords_light: imagination, visualization, choices, dreams, possibilities
cards.keywords_shadow: illusion, deception, unrealistic expectations, overwhelmed, lack of focus
cards.image_alt_en: A mesmerized cat staring at seven floating cups in the clouds, each containing a different item like a fish, a mouse, a ball, a snake, a castle, jewels, and a dragon.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A silhouette of a cat sitting and staring up at seven golden cups floating in mystical clouds, each cup holding a different symbol (fish, mouse, jewels, snake, castle, dragon head, laurel wreath), dreamlike surreal atmosphere, art nouveau style.
cards.meta_description_en: Seven of Cups Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Navigate through illusions, choices, and fantasies. Learn how to distinguish dreams from reality.

cards.tarot_imply_en: walking away, abandoning the loved, seeking meaning, disappointment, journey
cards.standalone_past_en: You recently decided to walk away from a situation or relationship you once loved but no longer served you. The pain of parting lingers, but you knew you had to move on.
cards.standalone_present_en: Saturation point reached. What used to fulfill you now feels empty. It might be time to leave past successes behind and embark on a journey to find deeper meaning.
cards.standalone_future_en: Major change awaits. You will embark on a journey (physical or spiritual) to find something truer. Though you leave comfort behind, what you find will be worth it.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Leaving an unfulfilling past behind leads to a present search for new meaning, guiding you toward true happiness and spiritual fulfillment in the future.
cards.love_past_en: You walked away from a relationship that looked good but felt empty, or left a loved one for your own future.
cards.love_present_en: Feeling like this love isn't quite right; something is missing. You might be considering whether to stay or go.
cards.love_future_en: A breakup might occur to find a more spiritually fulfilling partner, or time apart is needed for reflection.
cards.career_past_en: You quit a stable job because you were unhappy, or abandoned a long-term project midway.
cards.career_present_en: Burned out at work. Feeling it offers nothing but money; wanting to try something more meaningful.
cards.career_future_en: You will change jobs or fields to do something more soul-satisfying, even if the initial pay is lower.
cards.finance_past_en: You walked away from a financial opportunity due to principles, or accepted a loss to end a problem.
cards.finance_present_en: Feeling that money isn't the answer to everything; starting to value spiritual happiness over wealth.
cards.finance_future_en: You might spend a lump sum on travel or education to elevate your spirit.
cards.action_prompt_en: If it's not right, don't force it! Have the courage to turn your back and walk away. The path ahead has much to explore.
cards.reflection_question_en: What have you been carrying that's too heavy, and is it time to finally put it down?
cards.affirmation_en: I dare to leave behind what is not right to make space for what is.
cards.hook_en: Sometimes walking away doesn't mean you're a coward... it means you choose yourself.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Pack a small bag with 3 essentials. Walk around the room wearing it, imagining you are journeying to a new land, leaving worries at the starting point.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What situation do you feel you can no longer 'force' yourself to endure?
If you dared to walk away, how would your life change?
What does the true happiness you are seeking look like?
cards.keywords_light: abandonment, withdrawal, seeking truth, personal growth, letting go
cards.keywords_shadow: fear of the unknown, escapism, aimlessness, avoidance, hopelessness
cards.image_alt_en: A solitary cat walking away into the mountains under a moonlit sky, leaving behind eight stacked golden cups in the foreground.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A solitary grey cat walking away from the viewer up a rocky mountain path towards a crescent moon, leaving behind eight golden cups stacked neatly in the foreground, dark blue night sky, mysterious atmosphere, art nouveau style.
cards.meta_description_en: Eight of Cups Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Walking away from the unfulfilling. Discover the courage to seek deeper meaning and leave the past behind.

cards.tarot_imply_en: wish fulfillment, satisfaction, overflowing joy, self-reward, pride
cards.standalone_past_en: You recently attained a long-desired wish or enjoyed a period of celebrating personal success happily.
cards.standalone_present_en: This is the wish card! What you asked for is coming true. You are sitting there grinning, surrounded by success and life satisfaction.
cards.standalone_future_en: The near future holds perfect happiness. You will get everything you want‚Äîlove, money, and fame. Prepare to receive gifts from the universe.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past successes bring present satisfaction, signaling a future filled with the fulfillment and happiness you've been waiting for.
cards.love_past_en: You experienced a love that made you feel incredibly lucky or ended up with your dream partner.
cards.love_present_en: Singles are very popular with many choices. Couples are enviably happy together.
cards.love_future_en: Love will have a happy ending, leading to marriage or a blissful life together.
cards.career_past_en: You received an award or praise that made you extremely proud of yourself.
cards.career_present_en: Goals achieved; you are doing what you love and enjoying your work immensely.
cards.career_future_en: Promotion or rewards exceeding expectations are coming; success is within reach.
cards.finance_past_en: You had a stroke of luck or succeeded in an investment.
cards.finance_present_en: Living well with plenty of money. You can buy whatever you want without worry.
cards.finance_future_en: Wealth will increase; you will enjoy financial freedom and comfort.
cards.action_prompt_en: Smile and accept your luck! Reward yourself; you worked hard for this. Savor it.
cards.reflection_question_en: If your one wish could come true today, what would it be?
cards.affirmation_en: I am worthy of all happiness and fulfillment.
cards.hook_en: Get ready to celebrate, kitty! Because what you wished for is being served.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Write a wish on paper, put it under your pillow. Before sleep, visualize it coming true and smile widely as you drift off.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What is your deepest desire right now?
What reward do you want to give yourself after achieving your goal?
What are you most grateful for today?
cards.keywords_light: wishes coming true, satisfaction, happiness, luxury, gratitude
cards.keywords_shadow: greed, smugness, superficiality, overindulgence, never satisfied
cards.image_alt_en: A smug, well-fed cat sitting on a cushioned bench with arms crossed, nine golden cups arranged in an arc behind it on a blue drape.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A chubby, contented tuxedo cat sitting with crossed paws on a wooden bench covered in blue velvet, nine golden chalices arranged in a neat arc behind it, expression of smug satisfaction, art nouveau style.
cards.meta_description_en: Nine of Cups Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: The wish card! Discover happiness, satisfaction, and dreams coming true.

cards.tarot_imply_en: ultimate happiness, happy family, harmony, fulfillment, peace
cards.standalone_past_en: You recently experienced the warmest time of your life, surrounded by love and understanding. This memory serves as a foundation for your emotional strength.
cards.standalone_present_en: This is true happiness! Everything in life‚Äîfamily, love, and relationships‚Äîis aligning perfectly, like seeing a rainbow after the rain.
cards.standalone_future_en: The life you dreamed of is becoming reality. You will build a warm family or enjoy a happy, peaceful retirement surrounded by loved ones.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past warmth fosters present harmony, guiding you toward lasting, perfect happiness in the future.
cards.love_past_en: You experienced a fairytale-perfect love or grew up in a warm, loving family.
cards.love_present_en: Love has ripened; it's time for marriage, building a family, or enjoying marital bliss to the fullest.
cards.love_future_en: You will find a good partner and build a warm family together, growing old side by side.
cards.career_past_en: You worked in an organization that felt like family or achieved great success winning major awards.
cards.career_present_en: Excellent workplace atmosphere; everyone is united. Work is completed successfully through teamwork.
cards.career_future_en: You will work on what you love and truly enjoy it. Success will come with life balance.
cards.finance_past_en: Family helped with finances, or you received an inheritance.
cards.finance_present_en: Financial stability; plenty to spare. You can provide a good life for your family.
cards.finance_future_en: You will accumulate wealth to pass on to descendants. Financial future is bright and secure.
cards.action_prompt_en: Go home and hug your loved ones! Spend time with family and share your happiness with them.
cards.reflection_question_en: What does 'perfect happiness' look like in your mind?
cards.affirmation_en: I create and deserve a happy, warm family.
cards.hook_en: No need to search far for happiness... just look around you.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Set a special dinner table and invite family to eat together. Talk only about good things and express gratitude for being together.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
When was your happiest moment with family?
What kind of family do you want to build in the future?
Who makes you feel like you've 'come home' whenever you're with them?
cards.keywords_light: happiness, family, emotional fulfillment, harmony, alignment
cards.keywords_shadow: broken home, family conflict, shattered dreams, isolation, pretending to be happy
cards.image_alt_en: A happy cat family (two parents and kittens) watching a beautiful rainbow made of ten golden cups arching over their home.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A happy cat family (two adult cats, two kittens) sitting on a green hill looking up at a rainbow of ten golden cups arching across a bright blue sky, a cozy cottage and river in the background, idyllic and peaceful, art nouveau style.
cards.meta_description_en: Ten of Cups Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Ultimate happiness and family harmony. Discover what this fulfilling card predicts for your relationships.

cards.tarot_imply_en: clarity, breakthrough, decisive action, intellectual victory, truth
cards.standalone_past_en: You recently experienced a moment of mental clarity or made a decisive cut to remove something unnecessary from your life. The confusion has been cleared away.
cards.standalone_present_en: Aha moment! A brilliant idea is sparking, or a truth is revealing itself right before you. It's time to use logic and wit to slice through problems decisively.
cards.standalone_future_en: Obstacles will be demolished by your intellect. Victory in negotiations or exams awaits. Your path forward will be incredibly clear and open.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past decisiveness brings present clarity, and the new ideas forming now will be your key weapon for future victory.
cards.love_past_en: You decided to break up or cut off a toxic relationship, or finally saw the truth about a love situation.
cards.love_present_en: Demanding clarity in status; no ambiguous relationships. Straight talk is better than beating around the bush.
cards.love_future_en: Direct communication will solve heart matters, or a new relationship will start based on logic rather than just emotion.
cards.career_past_en: Started a mentally challenging new job or got a project idea approved.
cards.career_present_en: Surgery time! Slice through work problems with quick, precise decisions. Leave emotions out of it.
cards.career_future_en: Your ideas will bring success, or you will win a bid/competition through wit.
cards.finance_past_en: You decided to cut unnecessary expenses or completely overhauled your financial plan.
cards.finance_present_en: Think before you spend! Logically analyze the value in detail before opening your wallet.
cards.finance_future_en: Knowledge-based investments will pay off, or you might win a property-related lawsuit.
cards.action_prompt_en: Draw your sword! Cut through the lingering problems definitively. Speak the plain truth, and everything will resolve.
cards.reflection_question_en: What truth do you know deep down but are afraid to speak out loud?
cards.affirmation_en: I possess sharp intellect and the courage to face the truth.
cards.hook_en: An idea sharper than cat claws... don't let it go dull, use it!
cards.ritual_2min_en: Write your problem on paper. Use scissors to cut it in half immediately, symbolizing 'cutting' the problem out of your mind.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What is the latest idea that just popped into your head?
What do you need to decide decisively today?
What mental block is standing in your way?
cards.keywords_light: clarity, breakthrough, truth, logic, victory
cards.keywords_shadow: brutality, sharp words, confusion, chaos, aggression
cards.image_alt_en: A determined white cat holding a glowing silver sword upright, piercing through a crown and breaking grey clouds to reveal the blue sky.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A determined white cat holding a glowing silver sword upright with both paws, piercing through a golden crown and parting dark storm clouds to reveal a clear blue sky, dynamic and powerful, art nouveau style.
cards.meta_description_en: Ace of Swords Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Mental breakthrough, clarity, and truth. Seize the new idea and cut through confusion.

cards.tarot_imply_en: difficult choice, blocked emotions, indecision, stalemate, negotiation
cards.standalone_past_en: You recently faced a dilemma where neither choice seemed right, or you tried to avoid a problem by turning a blind eye.
cards.standalone_present_en: You stand at a crossroads, blindfolded, refusing to face reality for fear of making a wrong decision. Stagnation helps nothing; take off the blindfold.
cards.standalone_future_en: You will eventually have to pick a side. Avoidance cannot last forever. Prepare yourself for a choice that will shift your life's direction.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past hesitation has led to present stalemate. Soon, however, you must make a decisive choice to unlock the situation and move into the future.
cards.love_past_en: You were torn between two lovers or completely closed your heart to everyone.
cards.love_present_en: Relationship stalemate; giving each other the silent treatment, or you are hesitating whether to stay or leave.
cards.love_future_en: A decisive choice must be made. Clarity will help resolve everything.
cards.career_past_en: You had to mediate workplace conflict or were forced to pick a side.
cards.career_present_en: Work is stalled waiting for a decision, or you are weighing two job offers.
cards.career_future_en: Circumstances will force you to choose a clear path. Stay or go‚Äîyou must decide.
cards.finance_past_en: Hesitated on an investment and missed out, or juggled finances month-to-month.
cards.finance_present_en: Budget is tight; afraid to spend. Carefully weigh needs versus wants.
cards.finance_future_en: A major financial decision will be required to solve debt or investment issues.
cards.action_prompt_en: Remove the blindfold! Face the truth and decide. The longer you wait, the more painful it gets.
cards.reflection_question_en: What are you most afraid of seeing when you take off the blindfold?
cards.affirmation_en: I possess the peace and wisdom to choose the best path.
cards.hook_en: Left looks good, right looks good... but stand still in the middle and you'll get run over!
cards.ritual_2min_en: Sit quietly with eyes closed. Hold objects of equal weight in each hand (like stones or coins). Weigh the feelings of two choices and see which hand feels heavier.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What are the two choices troubling you right now?
What are the pros and cons of each?
Which path does your deep intuition whisper you should take?
cards.keywords_light: balance, truce, crossroads, decisions, peace
cards.keywords_shadow: indecision, confusion, avoidance, stalemate, blocked emotions

cards.illustration_prompt_en: A blindfolded white cat sitting calmly on a stone bench with a turbulent sea behind, holding two large crossed swords over its chest, crescent moon in the night sky, cool blue and grey tones, art nouveau style, balanced composition.
